mapper.select: select * from company_material_out a left join mode_status m on m.mode_id=a.cmo_id where m.status=2
select cmo_id,cg_no,cg_name,task_no,pick_project,pick_date,pick_person,get_status,get_person,get_infos from company_material_out where task_no like #{no}
select DISTINCT task_no,pick_project from company_material_out where cmo_id in (SELECT cmo_id FROM company_material_out where get_status=1)
select distinct task_no,pick_project from company_material_out where pick_project = #{name}
select distinct task_no,pick_project from company_material_out where task_no = #{no}

SELECT cmo_id,cg_no,cg_name,task_no,pick_project,get_person,pick_date,dispose_person,dispose_time,dispose_reason, dispose_type,dispose_money,dispose_desc,dispose_status FROM company_material_out where get_status=1 and task_no like #{no} and remain_type=1
mapper.update: update company_material_out set remain_type=1 where cmo_id=#{id}
